choices: You learn more about your life.
111111211.content:
You slowly open your eyes. Strands of long brown hair get into your eyes. People are surrounding you asking you questions like " Miss are you ok." "Are you going into labor/do you have any contractions?"
You look at them confused. "What are you talking about?" You say to them in a very feminine voice that shocks you. You look down and see two swollen ee cup breasts on top of a pregnant belly. Your skin isn't pale white anymore but now a gorgeous carmel color. You look at your finger and a wedding ring is on it. You are now married. A purse is next to you and an id is in it. It says you are a 32 year old woman named Maria Sanchez.

"Does anyone have a mirror?" You ask the people.

Someone hands you one and you look at yourself shocked at what you see.

http://s1175.photobucket.com/user/bfine2...][IMG]http://i1175.photobucket.com/albums/r625...[/IMG][/URL]

You are now a latina woman that is pregnant and married. Memories rush you mind and you remember where your new house is. "I'm fine" you tell everyone around you, "The baby isn't due for another month. I'm only 8 1/2 months pregnant." You exclaim. You are shocked at the fact that you went from a normal white guy to a hot pregnant latina wife.

You waddle off of the bus and it is magically stopped at your new house. Your new body feels so weird and big and bloated. But you do have a nice rack and a big juicy butt like jennifer lopez. You get to the front door of this lavish house. You waddle in and are shocked at the extravagent luxurious house. A butler comes and takes your stuff to the master bedroom. He then leads you to the bedroom and takes your shoes off. "Is there anything else I can do. You have been told to stay off of your feet and are on bed rest per your doctor." he says. "Umm, I would like you to bring me a gourmet meal" you say with a spanish accent. You realize more memories are starting to rush in and you speak fluent spanish because you are from Venezuela. The butler comes back with a lavish meal. It tasted exquisite.

You rub your belly and the baby kicks and flips like its doing gymnastics. "Man, this baby is going to be an athlete like his father." You sing to tour belly in spanish. It feels so good. Your body is hot as you gawk at it in the mirror.

What happens next?

choices: Significance of what? So I've got a better sense of smell, big deal.
Heightened sense of smell?!? Uh oh!
1111122112.content:
One moment you’re riding the bus like normal, staring out the rain streaked windows and wishing you’d thought to bring an umbrella. The next you are turned into a cellophane wrapped tube of cardboard and cotton on the seat beside the pretty girl you’d been surreptitiously eyeing since she’d gotten on 3 blocks earlier. To say the sudden change was not a little disorienting would be like saying the thunderstorm currently pelting the bus was not a little damp. It took you a few seconds to figure out here you were.

The girl must have been sorting through her purse, piling the contents on the seat beside her as she searched. Surrounding you was a pile of miscellaneous items: coins, makeup, keys, bills, pill bottles, crumpled tissues, and other bits of junk that women seem to collect. You weren’t sure how you could know what was around you; it wasn’t like you were looking down at the pile or anything. With a start you realized you didn’t have eyes anymore, so you weren’t really ‘seeing’ anything. It was more like you were sensing shapes around you and somehow just knew what was there, just like you knew immediately what you had become, even though you’d never had reason to pay attention to the product in real life. Feminine hygiene was something to snigger at in health class, and the only time you’d ever actually handled one was a couple of years ago in grade 8 when your friends jokingly dared you to reach into the back pack of some girl whose name you’d never learned.

This girl must have found whatever it was she was looking for, because the next thing you knew she was gathering everything up off the seat. Darkness surrounded you as she stuffed you back into her purse, darkness and a maelstrom of scents and odors. Funny how you could still smell, you think as you drink in the various scents. There was the scent of new vinyl and old leather, tinted with the faint fragrance of powdered makeup. Subtle perfumes and the scent of lipstick was there too, almost masked by the smell of cherry chap-stick and spearmint gum. Underneath that was the faint coppery smell of a few stray pennies, a faint fruity smell like a wine cooler had either been spilled or had leaked at some point. There was old nail polish and new mascara, and the sharp medicinal smell of whatever pills were in the foil wrapped pouches beside you. You are amazed at the sheer variety of smells that washed over you, yet somehow you were able to separate and identify each one, no matter how subtle. It was almost as if whatever had turned you into a tampon had also heightened your sense of smell.

Does the significance of this occur to you?
1111122112.title: girl seat partner

choices: The bus arrives at the girl's stop
Someone sits next to the girl.
11111221123.content:
Oh crap!

It dawns on you that this heightened sense of smell could be a problem. You had no idea what a vagina smelled like, having had no personal experience with one. You can only go by what you’ve read in those brief and titillating glimpses of erotic fiction you’ve found on the internet, and that was often confusing and contradictory. A lot of the time the odor of a woman’s most intimate parts was described like it was some form of honey or nectar. Often the word heavenly was involved, although your dad would say the same thing whenever your mom cook cabbage rolls, and that smell made you gag every time.

There were also those descriptions where the smell was described as that of a fish market next to a butcher shop. You’ve always found that your crotch could be slightly funky and weird smelling, and could get downright ripe after a good game of basketball. Maybe the second description was closer to the truth. Perhaps it could be both, or something completely different. Whatever it was you would definitely be finding out at some point.

A feeling of dread settled into your stomach as you realize you are now an object whose only real purpose was to be carried around until you were needed to be stuffed into what was possibly the smelliest place of a woman’s body.
11111221123.title: Heightened sense of smell?!? Uh oh!

"Oh damn...", you say in your head as you look around. The ground you stand on is a hard, black plain that is coated with dust. Huge brown seats are in front of you and across a huge aisle to your left there are also huge brown seats which giant people are sitting on! Behind you is another seat in which you fell off upon fainting and further to your right is a large metallic wall which seems to stretch more than a mile to a similar metallic roof.

You then realize what happened you shrunk on the bus!

But there is a problem; getting to the front of the bus would take forever and by then the driver will be past your stop. You do have a friend who is sitting at the seat in the aisle across from you. She lives just two houses down from you, perhaps you can hitch a ride with her to get home or you could try to get someone to notice you so you can get help...
111112221.title: To Hitch or Not to Hitch
